I agree that this is a great torrent, but the movie was a total let down.  I completely concur w/ ashleymashley because she's right, I was like in tears for 3/4 of the movie and then at the end I was like WTF?!?  You want it to be an epic love tale, like the Notebook and it just didn't deliver.  The ending totally sucked.  And another movie that the creator of the Notebook did, which was another monumental piece of crap was The Last Song with Miley Cyrus.  I was willing to give it a shot (even though I can't stand Miley) because of my love 4 the Notebook, but again it totally sucked and I wished for my 1hr & 1/2 back of my life.  The "person" who did the Notebook needs to stop advertising that on all these other movies that totally blow.  It's like stick with the good stuff and when you run out of ideas just call it quits and hang up your boots (like Seinfeld) don't keep producing lack-luster crap that disappoints your one-time audience.  And that is my rant :P
